pages.text: Garden Cloche is a machine that help u to automaticlly grow your plants, cactus, sugarcane, but can not grow up saplings, we need a Water Pump to pump the water from a infinite water source to your Garden Cloche using Fluid Pump to transfer the fluids into the small dark square!
It have an output face is the orange small square on the bigger square in the middle of the garden cloche, use chest or drawers to store your results
There is an other small yellow squares next to the water input place where u can put a lever to turn on/off the machine, you just need to place the lever on 1 of the inputs.
